divs: sighting detailsi was standing outside my house with a friend were talking when i looked up at the sky and saw a bright red\orange orb, slowly moved across the sky{at very high altitude} zig zagging very fast and erratically at the same time the light was fluctuating between being a pin point dot and sort of fuzzy round the edges. the sky was completly clear and i could see all stars clearly. it hovered for some time {5 mins or so} then it shot over the horison at a great speed and a high altitude, this was also witnessed by my friend who was there also. it was clearly doin over 1000 mph as it disappeared over the horizon.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lochgilphead
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright red/orange orb changed intensity over time
